content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.3 - Races for three-year-olds

State Regulations

In races exclusively for three-year-olds, the weight
shall be 145 pounds. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
